title: Vi Tech
body:
I click on my internet searched up Vi. Turns out their was a Vi tech skin looked at it really careful and it was epic searched up Vi Tech skin again their was a video looked really cool and the song with it and I also main Vi please put dis in league of legends riot need to get this skin so bad.(I DID NOT MAKE THIS SKIN)

PICTURE-http://wall.anonforge.com/tech-vi-skin-art-league-of-legends-gevurah-lol-1920x1080/
VIDEO-https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BKnhnz-AhYM

replies.body: I guess it is a... vi-deo. Its not a bad skin idea, in my opinion. Kinda like a Battlecast Vi, without a metal head.

I'm not sure if vi is a creature because everybody tat has a battle cast skin is pretty much a creature???
they also were made from {{champion:112}}
i know its old but really wish 2 take dis skin into league of legends.
